vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.35;
son of: Micah (H4318H);
brother of: Pithon (H6377), Melech (H4429) and Ahaz (H0271H); also called Tahrea at 1Ch.9.41;
Also named: tach.re.a (תַּחֲרֵעַ "Tahrea" H8475)
§ Tarea = "chamber of a neighbour"
a Benjamite, son of Micah of the family of Saul
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Micaías; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
他利亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "鄰居的內室"
便雅憫人, 米迦的兒子 (代上 8:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
他利亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "邻居的内室"
便雅悯人, 米迦的儿子 (代上 8:35)
